# Tasks Document

- [ ] 1. Add hackathon portfolio entry to index.html
  - File: index.html
  - Insert new portfolio item HTML block within the portfolio-container div
  - Use exact structure matching existing entries (DonorSpark pattern)
  - Include carousel, title, description, and links
  - Purpose: Display hackathon organization experience in portfolio
  - _Leverage: Existing portfolio item structure at lines 700-762_
  - _Requirements: 1, 2, 3_
  - _Prompt: Implement the task for spec hackathon-portfolio-update, first run spec-workflow-guide to get the workflow guide then implement the task: Role: Frontend Developer specializing in HTML and Bootstrap | Task: Add a new portfolio entry for the Blockchain@NTU x Base Hackathon to index.html following the exact HTML structure used by existing portfolio items (DonorSpark at lines 700-762). The entry should include: (1) Bootstrap carousel with id="baseHackathonIndicators", (2) Title "Blockchain@NTU x Base Hackathon", (3) Tagline "Organizer | 200 Builders Worldwide | Singapore", (4) Description about organizing hackathon with Base, Virtuals, Sogni, AWS sponsors, (5) Pipe-separated links to News Article and Learn More page. Insert the entry near the top of the portfolio section. | Restrictions: Do not modify existing portfolio entries, use only existing CSS classes (no new styles), match exact Bootstrap carousel structure with carousel-indicators and carousel-inner | _Leverage: Copy structure from DonorSpark entry (lines 700-762), use same class names: container row col-lg-10 portfolio-item align-items-center, carousel slide col-lg-6, col-lg-6 d-flex flex-column justify-content-center | Success: New portfolio entry displays correctly with working carousel navigation, links open in new tabs, visual appearance matches existing entries | Instructions: Mark this task as in-progress in tasks.md before starting, use log-implementation tool after completion with artifacts documenting the HTML added, then mark as complete_

- [ ] 2. Create placeholder image for hackathon carousel
  - File: assets/img/portfolio/basehackathon1.jpg
  - Create or add at least one placeholder image for the carousel
  - Dimensions should be 507x234 pixels (or similar aspect ratio)
  - Purpose: Ensure carousel has visual content to display
  - _Leverage: Existing portfolio images in assets/img/portfolio/ for reference_
  - _Requirements: 1_
  - _Prompt: Implement the task for spec hackathon-portfolio-update, first run spec-workflow-guide to get the workflow guide then implement the task: Role: Asset Manager | Task: Ensure at least one image exists for the hackathon carousel. If user has hackathon images, help add them to assets/img/portfolio/ with naming convention basehackathon1.jpg, basehackathon2.jpg, etc. If no images available, note that user needs to add images later. | Restrictions: Do not create fake images, images should be 507x234 pixels to match existing portfolio images | _Leverage: Look at existing images like ripplexeasya1.jpg for dimension/format reference | Success: At least one image file exists in assets/img/portfolio/ for the carousel, or user is informed they need to add images | Instructions: Mark this task as in-progress in tasks.md before starting, use log-implementation tool after completion, then mark as complete_

- [ ] 3. Create hackathon detail page (optional)
  - File: hackathon.html
  - Create detail page following existing project page template
  - Include full hackathon details, sponsors, outcomes
  - Purpose: Provide detailed information when users click "Learn More"
  - _Leverage: donorspark.html or finforge.html as template_
  - _Requirements: 2, 3_
  - _Prompt: Implement the task for spec hackathon-portfolio-update, first run spec-workflow-guide to get the workflow guide then implement the task: Role: Frontend Developer | Task: Create hackathon.html detail page following the template structure of existing project pages like donorspark.html or finforge.html. Include: (1) Header with navigation back to portfolio, (2) Section title with "Back" link, (3) Carousel for images, (4) Two-column layout with overview, features on left and links/tech stack on right, (5) Details about sponsors (Base/Coinbase, Virtuals, Sogni, AWS), event date (August 26, 2025), location (AWS Singapore), and outcomes. | Restrictions: Follow exact template structure from existing pages, use same CSS classes and styling, include all required head elements and scripts | _Leverage: Copy template from donorspark.html, modify content for hackathon | Success: hackathon.html loads correctly, navigation works, styling matches other project pages | Instructions: Mark this task as in-progress in tasks.md before starting, use log-implementation tool after completion with artifacts documenting the page structure, then mark as complete_

- [ ] 4. Verify and test portfolio entry
  - Files: index.html, hackathon.html
  - Open portfolio in browser and verify:
    - Hackathon entry displays correctly
    - Carousel navigation works
    - Links open correctly
    - Responsive design works on different screen sizes
  - Purpose: Ensure implementation is complete and functional
  - _Requirements: 1, 2, 3_
  - _Prompt: Implement the task for spec hackathon-portfolio-update, first run spec-workflow-guide to get the workflow guide then implement the task: Role: QA Tester | Task: Verify the hackathon portfolio entry works correctly by checking: (1) Entry displays in portfolio section, (2) Carousel prev/next buttons work, (3) News Article link opens NTU page in new tab, (4) Learn More link navigates to hackathon.html, (5) Page looks correct on desktop viewport. Report any issues found. | Restrictions: Do not modify code during testing, only report findings | Success: All functionality works as expected, no visual bugs, links work correctly | Instructions: Mark this task as in-progress in tasks.md before starting, use log-implementation tool after completion documenting test results, then mark as complete_
